Core

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Core.Board

  • public class Board
extends Object
    Board class represents the game board. This class generates and stores the tile composition.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Peter

        public static void generateBonus()
        Method to attempt to generate a bonus reward on the board. Also updates the remaining lifetime of currently generated bonus rewards.
